answers.answer: This is not only good advice, but it is one of our rules, so please comply with the instructions above. If you wish to communicate one-on-one with a diabetes expert, please go to the www.jdrf.org website and click on the Online Diabetes Support Team link on the left side of the page. You will be directed to a page where you can tell us what your needs are and you will be matched up with a volunteer who is an expert in the area of need. You can then communicate one-on-one privately with that person as long as you desire.

We applaud you for wanting to help this family. I, too, am a type 1 diabetic, one of the long-timers, and I agree with you that some of the things we have lived through can help others. It is wonderful to be willing to share from your experience to help others get through those tough teen years. Been there, done that. It is rough for all. In any event, you are forgiven. :o)
